title: Introduction to NFTs
details: This course will prov_ide you with insights on the fundamentals of NFTs, such as how the NFT market works, how to mint and promote NFTs, future of NFTs and many more.

title: JavaScript Basics from Scratch
details: In this course, you will learn the concepts of variables and datatypes, conditionals, loops, arrays, objects and functions in JavaScript.

title: Blockchain Technology: A Quick Introduction
details: In this 9hrs course, learn the fundamentals of blockchain and how it is an alternative to the existing legacy systems.

title: Data Structures and Algorithm
details: Gear up for a DSA interview with this comprehensive prep on the topic along with practice quizzes and questions

title: Object Oriented Principles in Java
details: In this course, learn about the framework of classes and objects, and get introduced to the principles of OOP - Abstraction, Encapsulation, Inheritance and Polymorphism.

title: Object Oriented Analysis and Design for Beginners
details: In this course, you will learn about OOAD and why you need it. You will get introduced to the Object-Oriented Paradigm of software development and with Unified Modelling Language.

title: Business Analytics Fundamentals
details: This course will help you with learn and apply useful data visualisation tools.

title: Introduction to Business Analytics
details: This course will help you understand business buzzwords and in formulating hypotheses and understanding how decision making takes place in an organization.

title: Marketing Masterclass: Create your Brand
details: This is a Masterclass on building favorable brands from Siddharth Roy Kapur, the former MD of The Walt Disney Company India.

title: Fundamentals of Marketing
details: This course will help you understand what marketing is and how it helps the business' growth objectives.

title: Introduction to Social Media Marketing
details: This course will help you leverage social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn to increase your brand presence.

title: Introduction to Supply Chain Management
details: This course will teach you the essentials of supply chain management, including how supply chains operate, how to plan a supply chain, and how to use supply chains to achieve success.

title: Building Successful Celebrity Partnerships and Campaigns
details: This course will provide you with insights on Celebrity Partnership and how it works. You'll also learn how to design a branded content show with a celebrity.

title: Introduction to Social Media Marketing
details: This course will help you leverage social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn to increase your brand presence.

title: How do Brands Leverage User Generated Content?
details: This course will provide you an understanding of what user generated content is, why it is becoming more popular, and how different businesses are utilising it to market their products.

title: Basics of Search Engine Optimization
details: This course walks you through the basics of SEO, conducting an SEO audit and SEO operation.

title: Ultimate Guide to Email Marketing
details: This course will show you how to build, launch and analyze email campaigns.

title: Complete Guide to Content Marketing
details: In this course, you’ll learn about creating content strategy, planing and executing content marketing and defining campaign metrics.

title: Linear Regression: Step by Step Guide
details: This course will help you start your Machine Learning journey by introducing you to the concept of Regression. The course covers simple and multiple linear regression, and the relevance of regression in the industries.

title: Unsupervised Learning: Clustering
details: This course is designed to help you master Clustering in Unsupervised Learning. It includes basic introduction to Clustering, K-Means Clustering and its execution, Hierarchical Clustering, etc.

title: Logistic Regression for Beginners
details: The course covers the concept of Logistic Regression and its applications in the industry. Topics such as univariate and multi-variate logistic regression in detail.

title: Fundamentals of Deep Learning of Neural Networks
details: In this beginner-friendly course, you will learn about the most sophisticated and cutting-edge models in machine learning - Artificial Neural Networks or ANNs. You will be introduced to the basics of Neural Networks and various concepts related to Deep Neural Network

title: Linear Algebra for Analysis
details: This introductory course will help you learn Linear Algebra required for analytics. Topics such as vectors, linear transformations, matrices, eigenvalues and eigenvectors will be covered.

title: Introduction to Natural Learning Processing
details: This course on Artificial Intelligence will help in taking your first step towards learning the interactions between human language and computers i.e., NLP. The course covers the basics of NLP, and other topics such as RegEx for building tools for Spell Correction, Phonetic Hashing, and Spam Detection.

title: Constitutional Litigation
details: This course will proivde details on constitutional litigation, why is it important and the various elements of constitutional litigation. You'll also get insights on how to build a career in constitutional law.

title: Introduction to Intellectual Property Rights
details: In this course, you’ll be learning about IPR and its many interfaces, such as copyright, trademark, compulsory licensing, and patents, as well as the relevant laws and case law.

title: Law and Justice in a Gloablization World
details: This course will give you an overview on the background of law and justice, globalisation, the repercussions of globalisation on transnational crime. You'll also get insights on drug trafficking and how world is responding to it.
